arts.ttl: Serie A | Empoli v Bologna: Probable starting lineups
arts.sum: Bologna face a significant challenge in their attacking lineup for Saturday's match against Empoli, with eight-goal winger Riccardo Orsolini sidelined due to a thigh injury. This setback opens opportunities for Dan Ndoye, Benjamin Dominguez, and other squad players to compete for wide positions. The post Serie A | Empoli v Bologna: Probable starting lineups appeared first on FootItalia.com.

Bologna are unbeaten in their last three games against Empoli in Serie A (W2 D1) and only in their first seven ever matches between the two teams in the tournament have the Rossoblu avoided defeat for a longer run of matches against them (W3 D4). Among the teams they’ve faced more than five times at home in Serie A, Bologna is the one against which Empoli boasts the lowest loss percentage at home (10%), with five wins and four draws in 10 home matches against the Rossoblu in Serie A – though the only defeat came in the most recent of these matches (0-1 in March).

arts.sum: Mario Balotelli's future at Genoa remains uncertain as the January transfer window enters its final days.
